fr.defaultReply: Ceci est une réponse par défaut.

fr.playerNotFound: Ce joueur est introuvable. Si il s'agit de vous, vous pouvez commencer votre aventure avec `/start`.
fr.playerNotFoundAlreadyPlayed: Ce joueur est introuvable, mais il semblerait qu'il ait déjà joué à une version antérieure. Si il s'agit de vous, faites la commande `/start`.

en.cooldownReply: Please wait %TIME before being able to interact again.
en.requestsReply: You already have commands in progress. Please finish their interactions.
en.noUserPermissionsReady: You do not have the required permissions to use this command.
en.noClientPermissionsReply: I do not have the required permissions to use this command.

en.noUserAuthorizationReply: You are not authorized to use this command.
en.playerNotFound: This player is not found. If it's you, you can start your adventure with `/start`.
en.playerNotFoundAlreadyPlayed: This player is not found, but it seems that he has already played an earlier version. If it's you, do the command `/start`.
